Summary: Aloft Beijing Haidian is a modern, clean hotel with amenities such as a gym, pool, and free internet, located in the Haidian district, a bit remote from central Beijing but near a large shopping center. It is next to the Four Points Hotel, also part of the Starwood group, and may be suitable for university students in Haidian.

Ascott Beijing is located in the central business district and offers spacious apartments with amenities like high-speed internet, a fully-equipped kitchen, and laundry facilities. It also has on-site facilities such as a gym, pool, restaurants, and a mini-market.

Autumn Garden Hotel is located in a hutong near Tiananmen Square and offers free internet, along with both English and Chinese breakfast options. The hotel provides services such as airport pickup and a mobile phone for use during the stay, and is within walking distance of subway stations.

Bamboo Garden Hotel is located in a hutong, near the Gulou subway station, and offers amenities such as in-room computers with internet access. Some found the location convenient for business appointments, while others appreciated its proximity to sights and restaurants.

Century Towers Beijing offers apartment-style rooms with multiple bedrooms, full kitchens, dining rooms, and washer/dryers, and also has amenities such as a workout room, and a restaurant. The rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable, including some English-language channels.

The hotel is located about 20-30 minutes from Tiananmen Square and has a coffee shop and business center. Some found the staff helpful and the breakfast buffet good with both Western and Asian options.

Far East Hotel/Youth Hostel offers both hotel rooms and dorms in a hutong location, near Tiananmen Square and the subway, with amenities such as a restaurant, bar, travel agency, and internet access. Some rooms include a desk, and the hotel provides services like laundry and tour bookings.

The Friendship Hotel is a large complex with multiple buildings, restaurants including a TGI Friday's, a supermarket, and a sports center with a pool and fitness center. It's located near universities and has amenities like free wireless internet in some rooms and a business center.
The Guangming Hotel is near the US and Japanese embassies, off the 3rd Ring road, and adjacent to a food street. Rooms feature LCD TVs with international channels and free internet.

The Beijing Hotel is located near Tiananmen Square, Forbidden City, and Wangfujing shopping area, with a subway stop in front. Some rooms have balconies, and amenities include a gym, indoor pool, business center, and multiple restaurants.

Beijing International Hotel is centrally located near the train station and subway, with amenities such as a business center, money exchange, and breakfast buffet. Some rooms offer city views, and the hotel is within walking distance to shopping areas and historical sites.

Jade Youth Hostel offers private rooms and dorms with amenities like free Wi-Fi, tour booking, and breakfast, and is located within walking distance of the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square. Some rooms include a desk, chair, and TV, and the hostel provides services like laundry, lockers, and airport pick-up.

Sihe Hotel is recommended for leisure travelers due to its unique hutong experience and central location, but it may not be suitable for business travelers because it is not an easy place to work on a computer, taxis are not convenient, and the location is not near the financial district. The hotel offers free internet access, which could be beneficial for business travelers.

The Radegast Beijing is a modern hotel located in the central business district, within walking distance of CBD buildings and a subway station, but tourists may find the location less ideal. The hotel features spacious, well-appointed rooms, a business center, a spa, a pool, and multiple restaurants.

Capital Hotel in Beijing is a large hotel with amenities such as a business center, indoor pool, gym, bowling alley, and multiple restaurants. Its central location provides walking distance access to Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City, and shopping streets.

The China World Hotel is well-located in the Chaoyang district, atop a subway stop and connected to the China World shopping mall, making it convenient for both business and leisure. The hotel is near office towers, the Silk Market, and tourist sites like Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City.

City Hotel is located close to bars, local restaurants catering to foreigners, and the subway, which offers convenient access to Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City, and the Military Museum. Taxis are readily available for work meetings.

The Commune by the Great Wall offers a peaceful location near the Great Wall, featuring architecturally unique villas suitable for groups, a spa, and dining options. It provides private access to an unrestored section of the Great Wall and is equipped with conference facilities.
Courtyard 7 is located in the hutong area near shops, pubs and restaurants and offers free internet. The hotel provides services such as arranging train tickets, laundry, and free bicycle hire.

The Courtyard by Marriott Beijing is a modern, clean hotel conveniently located near the subway and a shopping complex, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers. Although some found the front-of-house staff surly and the beds hard, the hotel offers a business center and is in close proximity to tourist attractions.

The Courtyard by Marriott Beijing Northeast is modern, with immaculate, spacious rooms and English-speaking staff, making it convenient for business travelers. The hotel is located about 20 minutes from the airport and close to a subway station via bus, with a modern gym, lap pool, and spa tub.

The Crowne Plaza Beijing is centrally located on Wangfujing Street, near shopping, food, and tourist attractions like Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City, making it convenient for both business and leisure. The hotel offers amenities such as broadband internet, a business lounge, and club floor privileges, along with comfortable rooms and a good breakfast buffet.

The Crowne Plaza Zhongguancun is near Peking and Tsinghua Universities, and the Olympic "Bird Nest," accessible via a 20-minute subway ride. The hotel offers a gym, heated indoor swimming pool, Club Lounge, and multiple restaurants, with fast internet connection.

The Crowne Plaza Beijing is located near the airport and exhibition center, making it convenient for business travelers. However, it is far from the city center, which may be a drawback for leisure travelers interested in sightseeing.

The hotel is near the Olympic venues and has spacious rooms, a good breakfast buffet, and a swimming pool, making it suitable for both business and family travelers. There are restaurants and a shopping area nearby.

The Crowne Plaza Sun Palace Hotel is a new hotel with large rooms, comfortable beds, and a great buffet breakfast with western and Chinese options. It has a pool, fitness center, spa, and is located near subway lines, making it accessible to the city center.

Days Inn Forbidden City is in a central location, near Tiananmen Square and Wangfujing Street, with rooms that include free broadband and a business center. The hotel provides modern amenities such as flat-screen TVs and is close to subway stations and tourist attractions.

Days Inn Joiest Beijing offers modern, clean rooms with flat-screen TVs and a buffet breakfast, and is located near a subway line and shopping area. Some found the hotel suitable for business travel, while others noted its distance from attractions and limited nearby restaurant options for leisure.
I can't provide a summary because the reviews do not mention business travel.

The Doubletree Hilton Beijing is recommended for both business and sightseeing, with spacious and clean rooms. It offers wireless internet in the lobby and is a short taxi ride away from the subway station.

The Empark Grand Hotel offers amenities such as a gym, pool, and a vegas-like mall in the basement with restaurants, boutiques, and spas. Wired internet access is available in the rooms, and the Golden Resources Cafeteria offers buffet breakfast and dinner.

Fujian Hotel is conveniently located near the 3rd ring road and a mall with a supermarket and Starbucks, about 20-30 minutes from the airport. It offers amenities such as free WIFI, a business center, and a breakfast buffet with both Western and Chinese options.

Gloria Plaza Hotel has a convenient location near the underground station and shopping streets, with spacious rooms and various facilities. It caters to large groups and offers a breakfast buffet with western and Chinese food.

The Grand Hotel Beijing features a business center and is centrally located near the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square, with easy access to shopping areas and the subway. Some reviewers noted the availability of wifi, meeting spaces, and proximity to both tourist attractions and business districts.

The Grand Hyatt Beijing is centrally located near the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square, with direct access to the Oriental Plaza shopping mall and subway station. It offers amenities such as a gym, pool, business center, and various dining options suitable for both business and leisure travelers.

Grand Mercure Hotel Xidan Beijing is conveniently located near Financial Street and Beijing CBD, with easy access to subway lines and tourist attractions such as Tiananmen Square and Forbidden City. The hotel offers Wi-Fi in public areas, a lobby bar with live piano music, and Cantonese cuisine.

Grand Millennium Hotel has spacious and luxurious rooms with free internet, large bathrooms, and a convenient location next to the subway station and the CBD, but some found the service to be inconsistent and the staff not always fluent in English. The hotel offers amenities such as a gym, a large pool (though sometimes under construction), and diverse dining options, but some reviewers noted issues with taxi drivers not knowing the location and occasional smells in the hallways.

Grand View Garden Hotel is described as having business services and internet access, though some found the internet expensive. Some found it suitable for tour groups with clean rooms, while others noted its distance from attractions, making it better for those not needing to be central.

The Guangzhou Hotel offers complimentary WIFI and is located near the Beijing Pedestrian Road, convenience stores, restaurants, and a shopping complex. It is also close to the subway, Tiananmen Square, and the Forbidden City.

Harmony Hotel is conveniently located near the Beijing Railway Station and subway, making it easily accessible for travelers; some deluxe rooms are spacious with a sitting area suitable for work or relaxation. The hotel offers amenities such as a business center, currency exchange, and tour booking services.

The Hebei Hotel is a courtyard hotel located in a hutong, offering a central location within walking distance of attractions like the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square. It has standard rooms and suites, with some larger, renovated suites available.

Hilton Beijing is suitable for business and leisure travelers due to its proximity to the airport and business district, along with amenities like an executive lounge, gym, and multiple restaurants. The hotel is near shopping areas, though a taxi or subway is needed to reach the main shopping streets.

The Hilton Wangfujing is a modern hotel with large rooms, a gym, and an executive lounge with free internet, and is located near shopping and tourist attractions like the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square. Some rooms have a desk/work area, and conference/business facilities are available.

The Holiday Inn Lido is located near the airport and contains multiple restaurants, a gym, pool, shops, and a business center. The hotel offers amenities such as laundry service, internet access, and tour booking, and is near the Lido Place shopping mall.

Holiday Inn Central Plaza is a modern, well-managed hotel that features spacious rooms, excellent service, and amenities such as a gym, pool, and business center. Although the hotel is not centrally located, taxis are readily available and the staff can assist with transportation and travel advice.

Holiday Inn Chang An West provides convenient traffic options and is located near the subway, making it easy to get around Beijing. It offers amenities such as free internet, laundry service, a gym, and an executive lounge, as well as a breakfast buffet catering to various nationalities.

Holiday Inn Downtown Beijing is conveniently located near the subway, shops, and restaurants, with renovated rooms that include a flat-screen TV. The hotel offers amenities such as a business center, breakfast buffet, and executive lounge access.

Holiday Inn Minzuyuan is a modern hotel with free internet access and a laundry room, located near the Beitucheng Subway Station. The hotel attracts a mix of domestic tour groups, business travelers, and Westerners.

Holiday Inn Express Temple of Heaven offers free WiFi, computer terminals, and a self-serve laundry room, with breakfast included in the rates. The location is near the Temple of Heaven but requires taxis to reach the city center and subway.

Holiday Inn Express Wangjing is a new hotel close to the airport and next to the Hua Tang Shopping Center, offering free internet in rooms and public areas, and a free breakfast. It is also near public transportation to sites like Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City.

Holiday Inn Temple of Heaven is noted for its business center, conference standard facilities, and rooms with amenities such as free broadband internet. Some reviewers mention the hotel's proximity to attractions and the subway, with staff available to assist with directions and taxi services.
The hotel offers free wi-fi in the lobby and has a computer for guest use. The breakfast is included, but the same food choices are offered every day.

Hotel Cote Cour is a small, beautifully designed hotel with modern amenities, wireless internet, and a lounge area suitable for both business and leisure. The staff is helpful in arranging transportation and providing directions in Chinese, and some rooms have desks appropriate for work.

Hotel G is a stylish and modern boutique hotel with spacious rooms, comfortable beds, and amenities like free WiFi, a gym, and a business center. It is located near the Sanlitun area, making it convenient for both nightlife and access to other parts of Beijing.

Ibis Sanyuan Hotel is located near the Sanyuanqiao subway station on Line 10 and the Airport Express train, providing easy access to the airport and Beijing city center. The hotel offers free internet in the rooms and is situated next to a Novotel, with a Western grocery nearby.

The Kunlun Hotel offers executive floors with butler service, renovated rooms, and free food, and a revolving restaurant with Indian cuisine. It has multiple restaurants and bars, and is noted for attentive service, though its location is not central to tourist attractions.

New Otani Chang Fu Gong Hotel is centrally located on Chang An Avenue, close to the subway, Silk Market, and Friendship Store, making it convenient for business and tourist activities. The hotel offers amenities such as a business center, health club, pool, and multiple restaurants, including Japanese options.

The Howard Johnson Paragon is conveniently located near the Beijing Railway Station, subway, and a shopping mall with restaurants and a supermarket. It offers amenities such as a business center, internet access, and breakfast, and is within walking distance or a short taxi ride to Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City.

The Huadu Hotel offers business rooms with desks and corporate rates including breakfast; deluxe rooms are spacious and clean. It is located near the International Exhibition Centre, Agriculture Exhibition Centre, Lufthansa Centre, Sanlitun bar Street, and embassy districts.

Hua Wei Business Appartment Hotel offers apartment-style rooms with kitchens, living rooms, and amenities like internet access and washing machines, catering to both business and leisure travelers. The hotel is located in a busy shopping district with access to a pool and gym, and is near public transportation and restaurants.

The Intercontinental Beijing Beichen offers amenities such as work desks with stationery, LCD TVs with English-speaking stations, and business center services, but internet use is not complimentary. It is located near the Olympic Green and National Convention Center, but a distance from the city center and shopping areas, accessible by taxi or subway.

The Intercontinental Beijing is located in the financial district, making it suitable for business travelers, but is also within a 15-20 minute taxi ride of the CBD. The hotel offers club level rooms with benefits such as breakfast, snacks, drinks, and internet access, as well as a fitness center and spa.

Jade Garden Hotel's location is ideal for sightseeing, with walking distance access to Forbidden City, Tiananmen Square and shopping districts. The hotel provides free internet access and has rooms with large flat screen TVs.

The Jian Guo Hotel is well-located for both business and leisure, near the subway, Silk Market, and office buildings. It offers amenities such as a gym, pool, business center, and varied breakfast options with both Western and Asian selections.

The Qianmen Hotel is reasonably priced and clean, with amenities such as a business center, multiple restaurants, and an in-house theater featuring Beijing Opera. It caters to tour groups and offers services like arranging packed breakfasts and writing destinations in Chinese for taxi drivers.

Jinqiao Hotel Apartments offers apartment-style accommodations with kitchens, washing machines, and free internet, along with on-site amenities like a supermarket, restaurants, and a travel agency. Its location provides convenient access to attractions and the train station, with taxis readily available.

Joy City Hotel Beijing is connected to the Joy City shopping mall and close to the subway and airport bus. Some rooms have a kitchenette, and the hotel offers amenities such as free internet access, a business center, and a breakfast buffet with both Western and Asian options.

The JW Marriott Beijing is a modern, well-furnished hotel with state-of-the-art connectivity, spacious rooms, and a large, modern bathroom with a TV. It is located in the CBD area, close to a subway stop and an upscale shopping mall, with a fitness center, spa, pool, and executive lounge.

Hotel Kapok is a modern boutique hotel with free internet, and is located within walking distance of the Forbidden City and Wangfujing shopping area. Some rooms have a computer and desk, and there is a business center, though it is limited in services.

Kelly's Courtyard is a 9-room accommodation located in a hutong area, offering quiet, clean, and comfortable rooms with free wireless, a rooftop terrace, and a glass-covered courtyard; it is a short walk to a main street with buses and taxis, and the staff can assist with directions and travel arrangements.

Kempinski Hotel Lufthansa Center is conveniently located near the airport, subway, and Lufthansa Shopping Centre, offering a range of restaurants, a supermarket, and access to both business and leisure facilities. The hotel provides amenities such as a pool, gym, and in-room dining, and is situated close to embassies and attractions.

The Kuntai Royal Hotel offers spacious rooms with comfortable beds, modern bathrooms, and internet access, with a location close to shopping, restaurants, and transportation. Some reviewers noted the breakfast buffet and pool/gym facilities.

Lee Gardens Service Apartment Beijing offers spacious apartments with kitchens and laundry facilities, suitable for longer stays, and is located near shopping areas, the subway, and attractions like the Forbidden City. The hotel includes amenities like a gym and pool, and is considered a good value for both business and leisure travelers.

The Legendale Hotel in Beijing offers spacious, well-equipped rooms with amenities like flat-screen TVs and DVD players, an "antique Rome" style pool, health club with jacuzzies and steam bath sauna, and a varied buffet breakfast. It is located near a shopping center, Starbucks, dining options, and within walking distance of the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square.

The Loong Palace Hotel is located in the Chang Ping district, close to the Great Wall and Ming Tombs, with facilities including indoor tennis courts, a bowling alley, recreation centre/gymnasium, pool and spa. The hotel has club rooms suitable for business travelers, good food, and is located within reach of major sightseeing areas.

The Luxury Serviced Residence offers spacious apartments with kitchen facilities, a workout room, and is located in the Chaoyang district close to commercial areas and tourist attractions. The front desk staff provides translation assistance and the hotel is near a 24-hour convenience store and subway access.

The Marco Polo Parkside Hotel offers spacious rooms with amenities like flat-screen TVs, internet access, and work desks, and is located a 10-15 minute walk from the Olympic Park and a 20-30 minute taxi ride from the city center. The hotel features a breakfast buffet with both Western and Chinese options, a spa, and a pool, but some staff may have limited English proficiency.
The Marriott West Beijing offers generous sized rooms, a breakfast buffet, and an executive lounge. Although located on the west side of the city, taxis are readily available and inexpensive.

The Marriott apartments in the Chaoyang district offer spacious 2-bedroom apartments with fully equipped kitchens, multiple TVs, and amenities like a gym, swimming pool, and sauna. The location is suitable for accessing attractions via taxi or metro, and the hotel is connected to a high-end mall with dining options.

The Marriott City Wall is a modern, spacious hotel near the Beijing railway station and subway lines, with amenities such as an Olympic-size pool, spa, executive lounge, and multiple restaurants. Although the location is not ideal for exploring major sights, it is convenient for transportation and offers comforts for business travelers.

The Mercure Wanshang Beijing offers amenities such as a business lounge, gym, and free internet, with subway access to the city center, making it suitable for both business and leisure. The hotel provides helpful services like translation assistance for taxi rides and has staff known for their hospitality.

Michael's House offers free internet access, a comfortable lounge area suitable for meetings, and is located a short walk from the subway, providing convenient access to universities and other parts of the city. Some rooms include a computer, and the hotel can assist with booking tours and arranging transportation.
The hotel is located in the Wangfujing district, near shopping areas, public transport, and the Forbidden City. Rooms include free internet.

The New World Hotel is located in the Chaoyang District, near the Chaoyang theater, with easy access to the subway. It is near the financial district and World Trade Center and offers modern rooms with LCD TVs, a breakfast buffet, and a convenience store.

The Nikko New Century Hotel in Beijing is near the Panda Zoo and Purple Bamboo Park, with standard rooms that are good-sized and comfortable. It is not centrally located, but taxis are reasonably priced and the hotel offers amenities such as a pool, health club, and business center.

Novotel Peace Beijing is a centrally located hotel with comfortable rooms and helpful staff, suitable for both business and leisure travelers. It offers amenities like free WiFi in the lobby, business center, and is within walking distance to shopping and tourist attractions.

The Novotel Xin Qiao Beijing offers premier-level rooms with amenities such as free breakfast, internet, laundry service, and access to a lounge and meeting rooms. It is conveniently located near a subway station and shopping centers.

Oakwood Residence Beijing offers large, comfortable apartments with fully equipped kitchens, laundry machines, and free WiFi. It is centrally located near shopping, restaurants, and the subway, with amenities such as a pool, gym, and spa.

Orange Hotel is located close to the subway, making it easy to get around, and within walking distance of the Olympic stadium. Some rooms include a pet goldfish, and the hotel provides little snacks each evening.

The Oriental Bay International Hotel is a large hotel with spacious rooms, a fitness center, and an indoor pool. It offers a Western and Asian breakfast buffet and is located near a metro station for easy access to Beijing central.

The Oriental Culture Hotel is described as a 4-star business hotel with modern furnishings, free internet, and amenities like a plasma TV and work desk. It is centrally located, close to transport, downtown, restaurants, and a supermarket, with facilities including a gym, pool, and business services.

The Oriental Garden Hotel is conveniently located near Tian'anmen Square and the Forbidden City, with readily available taxis and a friendly, English-speaking front desk. It offers 24-hour room service with Asian and Western dishes, a business center, and free internet access on the executive floor, and is next to a garden complex that is free for hotel guests.

Marriott Palm Springs Executive Apartments offers spacious apartments with kitchens and laundry facilities, suitable for longer stays, and is located within a secure, upscale compound with access to a gym and pool. While a bit removed from the city center, it provides convenient access to business districts and the airport, making it appropriate for business and leisure travelers.

Park Hyatt Beijing is a high-end hotel located in the Chaoyang District with subway access and offers amenities such as a gym, pool, spa, and multiple dining options. The hotel features modern, spacious rooms with city views, high-tech features, and dedicated workspaces.

The Park Plaza Beijing Wangfujing is centrally located near the subway, shopping, and tourist attractions and offers free internet, a business center, and a large desk suitable for computers. Select rooms have amenities such as an iron and ironing board, and North American & European touches can be found throughout the hotel.

Peixin Hotel offers rooms with free internet access, computers, and sometimes large flat-screen TVs. It is located about a 10-15 minute taxi ride from city center attractions like Tiananmen Square and is near the Hongquiao market and Pearl Shopping Market.

The Plaza Hotel is described as a modern business hotel with clean, well-furnished rooms, several restaurants, and a business center, located on Beijing's Third Ring Road with convenient taxi access to major sites. It offers amenities such as free broadband, laundry service, and a buffet breakfast with both eastern and western options.

The Prime Hotel is located in the heart of Beijing, close to shopping, restaurants, and attractions like the Forbidden City, and offers amenities such as free internet, a business center, and a concierge team. The hotel caters to Chinese businessmen and offers wireless internet in the rooms.

The hotel is near a metro stop on line 1, providing convenient access to Tiananmen Square and the city center. It features complimentary internet, a pool, spa, gym, executive lounge with breakfast and happy hour, and is located next to a shopping mall with restaurants.

Qianyuan Hotel is located on a busy street with many restaurants and is within walking distance of two subway stations, making it accessible for travelers. The hotel offers amenities such as room safes and broadband access, with breakfast available and options for both Chinese and Western dishes.

The Raffles Beijing is in a great central location near the Forbidden City, Tiananmen Square, and shopping areas, with a subway station nearby, and offers free Wi-Fi. Rooms range from Landmark rooms in the original building to Executive rooms in the modern building, some with separate living areas and amenities for business travelers.

The Renaissance Capital Hotel is a modern hotel located in the Central Business District, close to a subway station and a shopping mall. It offers amenities such as a fitness center, indoor pool, business lounge, and restaurants, with rooms featuring spacious desks and modern technology.

The Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel features a gym, indoor pool, and club lounge, with broadband access for business travelers. Its location in the northeast part of the city, near embassies and a mix of local and Western restaurants, suits both business and leisure.

The Shangri-La Beijing offers amenities suitable for both business and leisure, such as a gym, spa, multiple restaurants, and a business center with internet access. While some find the location inconvenient for tourist activities, it can be a peaceful retreat from the city.

The Kerry Centre is a modern, luxurious hotel with spacious, clean rooms, a great gym, and a pool, located in the CBD next to the China World Hotel and embassies. It is connected to a mall with conveniences like dry cleaning, photo services, and a convenience store, and is a short walk to the subway.

The Shatan Hotel is largely business-focused, with rooms that are clean, spacious, and handy for local tourist attractions. It offers amenities such as free internet, helpful staff, and is located near the Forbidden City and other city parks.

The Sofitel Wanda Beijing is a modern and luxurious hotel with spacious rooms, a gym, a pool, and multiple restaurants and bars, located in the CBD/Financial area and near subway lines for convenient access to the airport and major sightseeing spots. It offers amenities such as free internet, comfortable beds, and a business center, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers.

The hotel is conveniently located near the Guloudaije subway stop on Line 2 and offers easy access to the Beijing Railway Station and Airport Express. It provides amenities such as a business center, and is situated in the hutong area, close to attractions like the Drum and Bell Tower.

Somerset ZhongGuanCun offers 2-bedroom apartments with central air conditioning, a daily breakfast lounge, a pool, and a gym. It is located within walking distance of a supermarket and the subway line.

The Spring Garden Hotel is a small, traditional courtyard-style hotel located in the hutong area of Beijing, with rooms decorated in a classic Chinese style and modern amenities. It is centrally located with easy access to public transportation and close to local attractions, with the staff being helpful in arranging tours and providing directions.

The Sunworld Hotel (formerly Tianlun Songhe Hotel) is described as a solid, clean, and reasonably priced hotel in a good central location near Wangfujing Street, the metro, and Tiananmen Square, with some staff speaking English. It offers comfortable rooms, though some find the beds hard, and is comparable to a Four Points or Courtyard hotel.

The Swissotel Beijing is located near a subway station and businesses, making it convenient for transportation and access to city attractions. It offers amenities such as a pool, health club, and varied breakfast options catering to both Asian and European tastes.

Templeside Deluxe Hutong House is located in a traditional Beijing hutong, offering an authentic cultural experience with clean rooms, air conditioning, TV, and internet. The hotel is centrally located with good transport connections to tourist attractions and shopping centers.

Aman Summer Palace is located a 45-minute drive from the heart of Beijing, offering a secluded experience with private access to the Summer Palace. The hotel features spacious suites, a library, a fitness center, a spa, and a private cinema.

The Emperor Hotel is a modern, boutique-style hotel with uniquely designed rooms and a rooftop bar offering views of the Forbidden City. It is located near the Forbidden City and other attractions, with free minibar, breakfast, and WiFi.

The Opposite House is a modern, stylish hotel in the Sanlitun district with spacious rooms, free mini-bar, and amenities like an I-pod docking station and work desk. It offers multiple restaurants, a bar, club, pool, and gym, with convenient access to shopping, restaurants, bars, and the embassy area.

The Peninsula Beijing is well-suited for both business and leisure travelers, offering a central location near shopping and attractions, along with amenities like free internet, business center, and airport transportation. Some rooms feature fax machines, desks, and master control panels.

The Regent Beijing is a modern, luxurious hotel with spacious rooms, a well-equipped gym, a large pool, and a convenient central location near shopping and tourist attractions, with a subway station adjacent to the hotel. It offers amenities such as free internet, a business center, and various dining options, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers.

The Ritz Carlton Beijing Financial Street is located in the financial district, making it suitable for business travelers, but is a taxi ride away from tourist attractions. It offers amenities like a spa, pool, and club floor, and is connected to a shopping mall.

The Ritz-Carlton Beijing is located in the Chaoyang District next to a high-end shopping mall and close to the subway, making it convenient for both business and tourist activities. The hotel offers amenities such as a business center, a pool, and a gym, with spacious rooms and a variety of dining options.

The St. Regis Beijing is located in the embassy area, convenient for business meetings in the Gold and Platinum zones, and a short walk or cab ride away from attractions like Tiananmen Square and the Silk Market. It offers amenities such as a business center, gym, pool, bowling alley, and butler service.

The Westin Beijing Chaoyang is a modern hotel located in the Chaoyang district, close to a metro station and the Lufthansa Center, with amenities such as a gym, pool, and executive lounge. It features large, well-equipped rooms with high-tech features, and offers business facilities and dining options.

The Westin Beijing Financial Street is a modern, luxurious hotel with comfortable rooms and wireless internet, located in Beijing's financial district near regulatory commissions and major finance companies; it is a short taxi ride to the National Theatre and Tiananmen Square. Some reviewers enjoyed the breakfast and happy hour buffet and the pool area, and the hotel also offers executive club facilities, serviced apartments, and a spa.

The Sunworld Dynasty Hotel (formerly Tianlun Dynasty Hotel) offers a central location near shopping areas, Tiananmen Square, and the Forbidden City, with amenities such as free in-room internet access, a business center, and executive floor services. The hotel features multiple restaurants, a gym, and a pool.

Tian Rui Hotel is conveniently located near Wangfujing Street and a subway station, offering amenities such as internet access, a restaurant, and English-speaking TV channels. Rooms are spacious with hardwood floors and include features like ironing boards, refrigerators, and mini bars.

The Tiantan Hotel is described as a typical Chinese business hotel with decent-sized, comfortable rooms, business services, and proximity to the Pearl Market and Temple of Heaven. It offers both Eastern and Western-style breakfast buffets and is near the Red Theater.

Traders Hotel in Beijing is centrally located in the business district, near the China World Trade Center, shopping malls, and a subway station, making it accessible to tourist sites. Some rooms are small, but the hotel offers amenities like a gym, spa, and restaurants and is within walking distance of the Silk Market.

The Traders Upper East hotel is a modern business hotel with good facilities, including a gym open until 11pm. It is located in the "new" business district, a 5-minute taxi ride to offices, and about halfway between the Beijing airport and the city center.
The Wangfujing Grand Hotel is located near the Forbidden City, shopping, and the night market. Some rooms have free internet, and the hotel has a business center.

The hotel is located near university sites, making it convenient for business travelers visiting Peking University, Qinghua, and Wangjing. It features multiple buildings with restaurants, cafes, bowling, and conference facilities, with subway and taxi access to central Beijing and tourist attractions like the Red Theatre.

The Xinhai Jinjiang Hotel offers amenities such as a swimming pool, spa, bowling alley, table tennis, gym, and business services. It is located within walking distance of shopping streets and attractions like the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square.

Xinyuan Inn is a budget-friendly hotel located in a modern, touristy hutong with convenient access to sights, buses, and a grocery store. Although the subway is a 15-20 minute walk, taxis are readily available, and the hotel offers amenities like air conditioning and breakfast.

The Xixi Youyi Hotel is located near the Xidan shopping district and subway station. It offers spacious rooms, a currency exchange office, multiple restaurants, and a Western/Oriental breakfast buffet.

The Xiyuan Hotel is located near business offices and across from the zoo, with some restaurants and shops nearby. It has clean rooms, internet access, and a breakfast buffet, but is far from tourist attractions.

This hotel is primarily a business hotel with a business center and Wi-Fi access, but the reviewer, a tourist, found the staff helpful and welcoming. The hotel is located in Haidan (University District), near Beijing Jiatong University, and has chic and stylish rooms with amenities such as comfortable beds, a walk-in shower, and satellite TV.

The hotel offers free internet, a tour desk, and is located near the train and subway stations, making it convenient for getting around the city. Some rooms have a computer and flat-screen TV, and the hotel has a shop and restaurant.
